response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $15,000 to us due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given your interest and the value you place on it, we are willing to consider an offer that reflects its true worth. Considering the significant benefit this product would bring to you, we propose a price of $12,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support to ensure your satisfaction. We believe this is a fair deal that maximizes value for both parties. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
